drug.name: Radavirsen
drug.description: Radavirsen is under investigation in clinical trial NCT01375985 (Safety Study of Single Administration Intravenous Treatment for Influenza).

drug-interaction.name: Rubella virus vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Rubella virus vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Radavirsen.

drug-interaction.name: Bacillus calmette-guerin substrain tice live antigen
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette-guerin substrain tice live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Radavirsen.

drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette-guerin substrain connaught live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Radavirsen.

drug-interaction.name: Yellow Fever Vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Yellow Fever Vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Radavirsen.

drug-interaction.name: Anthrax vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Anthrax vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Radavirsen.

drug-interaction.name: Typhoid Vaccine Live
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid Vaccine Live can be decreased when used in combination with Radavirsen.

drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Bacillus calmette-guerin substrain danish 1331 live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Radavirsen.
